heif.boxes

Class ItemReferenceBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • heif.boxes.Box
      • heif.boxes.FullBox
        • heif.boxes.ItemReferenceBox

  • public class ItemReferenceBox
extends FullBox
    This derived class handles the Box identified as iref - Item Reference Box. For technical details, refer to the Specification document - ISO/IEC 14496-12:2015 on Page 87. Basically, it allows the linking of one item to others via typed references. All references for one item of a specific type are collected into a single item type reference box.

    Version History:

    • 1.0 - Initial release by Trevor Maggs on 31 May 2025
    Since:
    31 May 2025
    Author:
    Trevor Maggs
